source:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Tui-Shirr could use some assistance with repair work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
栄光の門付近のツイ・シルは、小屋の修理をしているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the lumber and ring to Tui-Shirr.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EAB01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EAC01 /var>をツイ・シルに渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_000<tab>Are you busy? If not, I would greatly appreciate some help with repairing this shed─it's something of a mess, at the moment.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_000ふう……あんた、手空きじゃないかい？
よかったら、小屋の修理を手伝ってほしいんだ。
ちゃんと礼は考えとくからよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_001<tab>I'm low on lumber, but it'll take ages to get the work done if I have to stop and hunt down more materials. Can you bring me four solid-looking planks, for the time being? Some of the wood from the old sunken ships ought to still be fit for use.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_001材料が足りなくなりそうでな。
その辺りに打ち上っている船から、
「」を4つ集めてきてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_002<tab>You're looking for wood that's not too waterlogged or splintered. Doesn't have to look appealing, as long as it's sturdy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_002その辺りに打ち上っている船から、
「」を4つ集めてきてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You notice a glittering object wedged in the crevice between two boards. Extracting it from its hiding place, you see that it's a ring─one that has fared rather poorly in the elements. Perhaps Tui-Shirr will know to whom it belongs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_SYSTEM_000_010板材の横に、光るものを見つけた。
「」のようだ。
「ツイ・シル」に見せれば、何かわかるだろうか……。

TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_021ご苦労さん、助かったぜ！
ん……なんだこりゃ、指輪？

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_022<tab>Oh, this is a customs ring! They used to serve as authorization for traders to enter Eulmore.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_022おいおい……ユールモアとの交易が許可された商人が、
証明書代わりに与えられたっていう、指輪じゃねえか。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_023<tab>How do I know? Well, I used to work in the shipyard, as a matter of fact. Read a lot about its history at the time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_023なぜ俺がそんなことを知っているかって？
昔、造船所で働いてたことがあってよ。
そんときに、昔の船についての書物を読んだことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_024<tab>Someday, I'd like to rebuild one of those old ships─make it fit to sail the world on grand adventures once again. It's a far cry from stripping the same vessels for shed materials, but a man can dream.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_024どうせなら、船を壊して家をつくるんじゃなくて、
世界の海へと冒険に出るような、
でーっかい船を作ってみたいもんだぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_025<tab>I'll give you a portion of my pay for this job as thanks for your help. I thought about splitting my lunch with you instead, but the money is probably more portable. And considerably less ripe, at this point.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH013_03523_TUISHIRR_000_025なんにせよこいつは換金すりゃ金になるから、その分の報酬をやる！
俺の弁当を半分わけてやろうとも思ったんだがよ、
金の方が役に立つだろ？　へへっ、ありがとな！
